causes: French territorial ambitions in Southeast Asia
Siamese claims over Laos conflicting with French expansion
French accusations of mistreatment of Laotian populations by Siam
Strategic desire for Mekong River as a trade route
events_leading_up_to_war: French efforts to extend control over Laos from Vietnam
Siamese resistance to French influence in the region
Skirmishes between Siamese and French forces along the border

result.general: French victory, territorial losses for Siam
territorial_changes: Siam ceded all claims to Laos, which became part of French Indochina
French influence expanded in Southeast Asia
Siam remained independent but weakened diplomatically

French.warships: Naval squadron including gunboats and cruisers

major_battles.name: Paknam Incident
major_battles.description: French gunboats forced their way past Siamese defenses, triggering the final stage of the war.

major_battles.name: Capture of Khone Island
major_battles.description: French forces took control of Khone Island and surrounding areas from Siamese troops.

terms: Siam renounced all claims to Laos, which was annexed by French Indochina
French military occupation of Chantaburi as leverage for compliance
Siam agreed not to station military forces east of the Mekong River
Expansion of French influence in the region
impact: Marked the beginning of continued diplomatic concessions to Western powers
Increased Siamese efforts to modernize and maintain independence

long_term_effects: Further French expansion into Cambodia and Vietnam
Siam pursued modernization under King Chulalongkorn to resist colonialism
Laos remained part of French Indochina until 1953
Set a precedent for later border disputes between Thailand and French Indochina

economic: Loss of valuable territories along the Mekong River
French economic dominance in Laos and Cambodia
political: Led to later Franco-Siamese border negotiations
social: Laos integrated into French Indochina, altering its cultural and political landscape
Rise of Siamese nationalism in response to colonial threats
